title: Unión Tarija
text:
Unión Tarija is a <a href="Bolivia">Bolivia</a>n <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> team playing at Tarija Primera A, the 2nd division regional league. It is based in <a href="Tarija%2C%20Bolivia">Tarija</a>. Their home stadium is <a href="Estadio%20IV%20Centen%C3%A1rio">Estadio IV Centenário</a>. The team played in the <a href="Liga%20de%20F%C3%BAtbol%20Profesional%20Boliviano">Liga de Fútbol Profesional Boliviano</a> between 1999 and 2006.
History.
The Club was founded on April 8, 1980 as the Club Unión Central.
